column2: SELECT TOP # ----------------------------------------------------------------------- -- Photometric (photoObjAll) parameters ----------------------------------------------------------------------- p.objID, f.id AS FIRST_ID, f.ra AS FIRST_ra, f.dec AS FIRST_dec, p.ra AS SDSS_ra, p.dec AS SDSS_dec, p.mode, p.type, p.clean, ----------------------------------------------------------------------- -- PhotoZ paramters - Photometrically estimated redshifts and distances pz.objID AS pz_objid, pz.z AS pz_z, pz.zErr AS pz_zErr, pz.distMod, pz.lumDist, -- Spectroscopic (SpecObjAll) parameters ----------------------------------------------------------------------- s.specObjID, s.bestObjID, s.z, s.zErr, s.sourcetype, s.class, s.subClass, --------------------------------------------------------------------- -- Galaxy Spectroscopic Line (GalSpecLines) parameters ----------------------------------------------------------------------- -- Equivalent widths and errors gl.h_alpha_eqw ----------------------------------------------------------------------- -- Joining the various SDSS tables based on FIRST RA and Dec FROM MyDB.FIRST_REDUCED_RA_DEC AS f CROSS APPLY dbo.fGetNearestObjEq (f.ra, f.dec, #) AS x JOIN PhotoObjAll p ON x.objID = p.objID JOIN PhotoZ pz ON p.objID = pz.objID JOIN SpecObjAll s ON p.objID = s.bestObjID JOIN GalSpecLine gl ON s.specobjid = gl.specobjid
